Flying, haste
[i]Fawn Over[/i] – Whenever a creature an opponent controls enters, you may tap Nina, Blushing Admirer. If you do, you gain life equal to that creatures power, then goad it.
[i]Fly Over[/i] – Whenever one or more creatures attack one of your opponents, if Nina is tapped, you may have up to one target creature gain flying until end of turn.
